title: Final Year Project I
description: The course is designed to provide students with an opportunity to carry out, under the supervision of an academic staff, an independent project with research elements in computation data science topics. Advisory: For majors only.

description: The course is designed to provide students with an opportunity to carry out, under the supervision of an academic staff, an independent project with research elements in computation data science topics. Advisory: For majors only.
